subject: Title IX (Gender Discrimination Legislation)
Decisions and Verdicts
Volleyball
College Athletics
Discrimination
Women and Girls
Colleges and Universities
Cheerleaders
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court ruled that colleges cannot count competitive cheerleading as a sport when trying to comply with gender-equity requirements, upholding an earlier decision.
snippet: A federal appeals court ruled that colleges cannot count competitive cheerleading as a sport when trying to comply with gender-equity requirements, upholding an earlier decision.
